item.title: Advanced Elm: Codecs
item.description:
Intoduction Advanced Elm is a project to show some of the more advanced corners of the Elm language.
I have some objective for this project: showing that Elm, while simple and perfect for beginners, is powerful enough for a lot of advanced scenarios, trying to unravel how to use advanced language features like phantom types and extensible records, try to shed light on how do I come up with the types, and the APIs.
In this post I'll explain how I write libraries that use advanced types, using ...
